ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local

Class DBContract

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.local.DBContract

  • public final class DBContract
extends java.lang.Object
    Purpose: Defines the tables of the database that will be created for the application.
    Design Rationale: To have a class devoted to the actual structure of the database and its tables. Makes working with the Database more organized and cleaner, and if we need to change a column or something, we only need to change it here and not in the other parts of the code.
    Author:
    Ashley Brown, Stephanie Gil

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DBContract.ChapterTable
      Sets up column names and then create and delete SQL statements for the table containing the chapters
      static class  DBContract.ChoiceTable
      Sets up column names and then create and delete SQL statements for the table containing the choices
      static class  DBContract.MediaTable
      Sets up column names and then create and delete SQL statements for the table containing media (photos/illustrations/audio/video)
      static class  DBContract.StoryTable
      Sets up column names and then create and delete SQL statements for the table containing stories.
